description: The new Sony ZV-E1 is a compact mirrorless full-frame camera thats dedicated to content creators and aimed squarely at vloggers. Its the new flagship offering of Sonys established ZV line of vlog-centric cameras, taking a similar 12-megapixel backside-illuminated full-frame sensor as the pro-focused FX3 and mixing in the A7R Vs AI autofocus smarts to reduce the friction in making high-quality video content.
